howToPractice.title: How to Practice Half-Smile
instructions: Relax your face completely - let go of all tension
Allow the corners of your lips to turn up slightly - just barely
Keep your jaw relaxed and teeth slightly apart
Breathe naturally and maintain this gentle expression
Pair with a calming visualization for deeper practice

inputs.title: Calming Visualization
inputs.question: What peaceful place or soothing image did you visualize during your practice?
inputs.placeholder: e.g. A quiet beach at sunrise, a warm color washing over me, a peaceful forest...

inputs.title: Body Response
inputs.question: How did your body respond to the half-smile? Notice any changes in tension or relaxation.
inputs.placeholder: e.g. My shoulders dropped, my jaw relaxed, I felt lighter...

inputs.title: Reflection
inputs.question: What did you notice about your emotional state before and after the practice?
inputs.placeholder: Reflect on your experience... How do you feel now compared to when you started?
